alert.note: Alert for Fisher; Haskell; Jones (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 17 at 6:17PM CDT until June 17 at 7:15PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: The National Weather Service in San Angelo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Haskell County in west central Texas... Northwestern Jones County in west central Texas... Northeastern Fisher County in west central Texas... * Until 715 PM CDT. * At 616 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 11 miles south of Peacock, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Hamlin around 640 PM CDT. Sagerton around 650 PM CDT. Stamford around 715 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Hitson and Tuxedo. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
